alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 5:17PM CDT until April 12 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR EASTERN PORTAGE...CENTRAL WAUSHARA AND WESTERN WAUPACA COUNTIES... At 517 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Amherst, or 10 miles northwest of Waupaca, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waupaca, Wautoma, Redgranite, Amherst, Chain O` Lakes-King, Napowan Scout Camp, Hartman Creek State Park, Silver Lake, Pine River and Iola. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
